name: Marchosias' Arrow
description: It is said that the alien metal given by a certain god from another world can grant the wearer invincibility.

name: Marchosias' Bag
description: As one of the 72 pillar devils, other rumors that he and Lemegeton's relationship is quite good in private.

name: Marchosias' Gaze
description: Whoever is gazed at will feel paralyzed, and only able to go to bed.
effect: Max HP ＋300,For Refining ＋1, Dmg to Demi-Human race ＋0.1%

name: Marin Candy
description: A candy in the shape of Marin Poring, with a cool taste. Within 1 minute, the water damage you suffer will reduce by 100%. This effect cannot stack up with other Poring candies, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Marine Sphere Bottle
description: Throw it and a hammer will be set in the bottle. The one who stamps on it carelessly will be killed.

name: Marionette Doll
description: A doll designed like the popular puppet, the head is cool. It permanently increases the character's Hit by 10 points and cannot be traded.

name: Martin Hat
description: It is said that the Martin is very good at praising the peers, and they make a noisy call, so after wearing this hat, perhaps the adventurer will become more fierce!

name: Martin Hat [1]
description: It is said that the Martin is very good at praising the peers, and they make a noisy call, so after wearing this hat, perhaps the adventurer will become more fierce!

name: Martin Hat[1] Blueprint
description: It is said that the Martin is very good at praising the peers, and they make a noisy call, so after wearing this hat, perhaps the adventurer will become more fierce!

name: Mask of Darkness
description: A helmet that hides a half face to hide the identity. The equipment suitable for the Demon King.
effect: VIT ＋2,For Refining ＋1, M.Def ＋1% (upper limit of increases is 15%)

name: Mask of Darkness Blueprint
description: A helmet that hides a half face to hide the identity. The equipment suitable for the Demon King.

name: Mask of the Fourth Angel
description: The Fourth Angel - A sentient being capable of learning and regenerating. It attacks its foe by shooting a lance of light from its palm and energy blast from it's eyes. This mask radiates silent tension.
effect: Atk ＋20,Shoots disruptor beam when auto attacking a target. The beam has a 100% chance to reduce the target's DMG Reduction by 5% for 5s.
